de.gematik.ti.healthcardaccess

Class HealthCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gematik.ti.healthcardaccess.HealthCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHealthCard

    public class HealthCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHealthCard

    HealthCard is the class that is used to bind the CardReaderProviderAPI channel to the HealthCardAccess layer
